charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(A), 846 - Drug Conspiracy (Cocaine)(1)

CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(A), 846 - Drug Conspiracy (Cocaine)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced to the custody of the BOP for a term 190 months on each of Counts 1, 2, and 3, to all run concurrent. Defendant shall serve a supervised release term of 4 years on each of Counts 1, 2, and 3, to all run concurrent. $300 Special Assessment ($100 per count).
